arts.ttl: Chucky Lozano scores 1st MLS goal, adds 2 assists to help San Diego beat Sounders 3-0
arts.sum: Jasper Löffelsend, sprinting down the right sideline, played a one-touch pass — off a long perfectly-placed ball ahead by Tverskov — to Lozano, who outraced the defense to the center of the area and beat goalkeeper Stefan Frei to make it 3-0 at halftime. Chucky Lozano scored his first career MLS goal and added two assists — all in the first half — and FC San Diego beat the Seattle Sounders 3-0 on Saturday night.

arts.ttl: Kevin De Bruyne: MLS club has 'right' to Man City star as San Diego drop out
arts.sum: Kevin De Bruyne will leave Manchester City in July and an unnamed MLS club reportedly hold the “rights” to negotiate a deal this summer. Kevin De Bruyne: MLS club has 'right' to Man City star as San Diego drop out

arts.ttl: Sources: What's now set to happen with Man City icon Kevin De Bruyne as San Diego back away from deal
arts.sum: TBR Football can exclusively confirm what is now set to happen with Manchester City star Kevin De Bruyne in wake of San Diego FC backing...
